General.Name: Thac Mo Hydropower JSC
General.Description: Thac Mo Hydro Power Joint Stock Company generates and supplies hydro power in Vietnam. The company was formerly known as Thac Mo Hydropower Plant. Thac Mo Hydro Power Joint Stock Company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Phuoc Long, Vietnam. Thac Mo Hydro Power Joint Stock Company operates as a subsidiary of Power Generation Joint Stock Corporation 2.
